::KitKat::

She uncovered her face and looked at Drillbit.  Her body shaking in 
pain and grief.  She spoke to him in trambling voice,"please..please 
take the pain away. please." tears running down her face.  She just 
bout to her braking point.   Killing anything never bothered her 
before.  But then, she never had killed a friend before.

She looked at Drillbit, "anything, just take the pain away."
She hugged him and trembled. She was scared, and hurting.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit knew what she was saying. If he did this, she would not
> remember what they had.
> "No, there is another way. I can surgically alter your memory 
cirquits.
> I could make it so you forget the inncodent with Land Mine, but 
nothing
> els. I did this procedure on cybertron. I used to run a clinic."
